pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/tariochbctools.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tariochbctools.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/tariochbctools.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tariochbctools.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/tariochbctools/badge :target: https://tariochbctools.rtfd.iotariochbctools==============Some importers, plugins and price fetchers for the double-entry bookkeeping software `Beancount <https://beancount.github.io/>`__.See the detailed `Documentation <https://tariochbctools.rtfd.io/>`__.
